headline: Institutional Activity Climbs This Bitcoin Cycle, Tokenized RWAs Reach $24B: Glassnode
summary: Bitcoin’s latest market cycle is shaping up to be one of its most mature, with new Glassnode data showing a surge in institutional participation, calmer trading conditions and rapid growth in tokenized real-world assets. Glassnode and Fasanara Capital, in their Q4 Digital Assets Report, say the structure of the market ...

headline: BGL: Initiation of Vertically Integrated Gold Fintech Company with a Price Target of $20.00.
summary: By Thomas Kerr, CFA NASDAQ:BGL READ THE FULL BGL RESEARCH REPORT Blue Gold Limited (NASDAQ:BGL) is believed to be the world’s first vertically integrated gold platform that includes mining, tokenization, and digital wallet capabilities. headline: UbiRider Achieves PCI DSS Certification, Strengthening Security and Paving the Way for AI-Driven Transit Innovation
summary: PORTO, Portugal, December 03, 2025--UbiRider, the innovator behind the UbiRider Platform, the solution that seamlessly integrates transportation management, fare collection, open payments, passenger information, and data analytics into a single digital system, today announced that it has achieved Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI DSS) certification. This milestone validates UbiRider’s rigorous approach to payment security for bank cards and mobile wallets — collectively known as

content.title: UbiRider Achieves PCI DSS Certification, Strengthening Security and Paving the Way for AI-Driven Transit Innovation
content.summary: PORTO, Portugal, December 03, 2025--UbiRider, the innovator behind the UbiRider Platform, the solution that seamlessly integrates transportation management, fare collection, open payments, passenger information, and data analytics into a single digital system, today announced that it has achieved Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI DSS) certification. This milestone validates UbiRider’s rigorous approach to payment security for bank cards and mobile wallets — collectively known as

thumbnail.caption: UbiRider has achieved Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI DSS) certification. This milestone validates UbiRider’s rigorous approach to payment security for bank cards and mobile wallets — collectively known as open-loop payments — and positions the company to deliver more powerful fare collection features that drive deeper customer insights, more personalized services, and AI-driven efficiencies across transit payment processes.

headline: Can AXP Keep Its ROE Shining While Expenses Climb the Ladder?
summary: American Express navigates rising expenses with innovation and strong execution as it works to keep its standout ROE on track.

headline: Assessing Visa (V) Valuation After Recent Share Price Pullback
summary: Visa stock slips after recent pullback Visa (V) shares have eased off their highs over the past month, slipping roughly 2% over the past 3 months even as the broader market has held up reasonably well. See our latest analysis for Visa. That pullback comes after a solid run, with Visa still sitting on a mid single digit year to date share price return and a three year total shareholder return above 60 percent. This suggests momentum has cooled, but the long term growth story remains intact. If...
